typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Country as string,
		CarbonScope as string,
		EmissionCategory as string,
		EmissionType as string,
		EmissionFactorLocationBased as double '000,000,000.000',
		EmissionFactorMarketBased as double '000,000,000.000',
		UnitOfMeasure as string,
		StartDate as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		EndDate as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		Region as string,
		HasMarketBasedFactor as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'fsgdmsdevweeu01',
	folderPath: 'ESG_MAPDATA',
	fileName: 'EmissionFactors.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ';',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> EmissionFactorscsvSource
EmissionFactorscsvSource select(mapColumn(
		EmissionType,
		EmissionScope = CarbonScope,
		EmissionFactorLocationBased,
		EmissionFactorMarketBased,
		EmissionCountry = Country,
		UnitOfMeasure,
		EmissionEgridRegion = Region,
		EmissionFactorStartDate = StartDate,
		EmissionFactorEndDate = EndDate,
		EmissionCategory,
		EmissionName = EmissionType
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectDimEmissionFactor
SelectDimEmissionFactor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'ESG_POC_CE_ACN',
	tableName: 'DimEmissionFactor',
	input(
		EmissionFactorId as integer,
		EmissionType as string,
		EmissionScope as string,
		EmissionFactorLocationBased as decimal(18,2),
		EmissionFactorMarketBased as decimal(18,2),
		EmissionFactorVirtualBased as decimal(18,2),
		EmissionCountry as string,
		EmissionEgridRegion as string,
		EmissionBanner as string,
		EmissionName as string,
		EmissionCategory as string,
		EmissionFactorStartDate as date,
		EmissionFactorEndDate as date,
		UnitOfMeasure as string
	)) ~> DimEmissionFactorSink
